column1: AYA(R) is a Primitive Quendian Sundocarme signifying "sea".
In the The Etymologies appears the root ÁYAR-
column2: AIR- (with an Wikipedia:Inverted breve on the "I") signifying "sea
column3: only used of the inner seas of Middle-earth"
column4: derived from root AY. The root yields the Quenya derivatives ear (earen)
